summary: Alters stats of Ancient Nord/Nord Hero equipment, adds smithing recipes.
descriptionHtml:
ANCIENT NORD EQUIPMENT REBALANCED


My favorite Skyrim questline is that of the Companions, and my favorite armor and weapon sets are the Ancient Nord/Nord Hero. Unfortunately, neither takes your breath away in terms of stats, so I've made some adjustments.

- Ancient Nord Weapons and Armor match their Steel counterparts, and are all craftable at regular forges with the Steel Smithing perk.

- Nord Hero Weapons do damage on par with Glass. Adds Nord Hero Armor, which has armor values on par with Orcish. Both weapons and armor weigh as much as Iron (carried over from vanilla). Both are craftable at the Skyforge after the Companions storyline with the Advanced Armors perk.

- Adds crafting and tempering recipes for Tsun's Armor and Boots. Both are craftable at the Skyforge after the Companions storyline with the Advanced Armors perk. Stats are slightly better than Scaled.

- Unique Ancient Nord equipment (Helmet Of The Unburned, Eduj, Okin, Ahzidal's Armor) is of Nord Hero quality. Ghostblade has been bumped to Honed Nord quality to match the other ghost weapons.

-

Feel free to post any questions or requests in the comments section, and constructive criticism is welcomed!
author: Sinistas
